targets.rawSql: SELECT trade_id, symbol, direction, entry_price, stop_loss, take_profit, size, leverage, strategy_used, market_regime, confidence_at_entry, opened_at FROM trades WHERE status = 'open' ORDER BY opened_at DESC
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(pnl_usd), 0) AS unrealized_pnl FROM trades WHERE status = 'open'

SELECT symbol, direction, entry_price, stop_loss, take_profit, CASE WHEN direction = 'LONG' THEN ROUND(((entry_price - stop_loss) / entry_price * 100)::numeric, 2) ELSE ROUND(((stop_loss - entry_price) / entry_price * 100)::numeric, 2) END AS sl_distance_pct, CASE WHEN take_profit IS NOT NULL AND direction = 'LONG' THEN ROUND(((take_profit - entry_price) / entry_price * 100)::numeric, 2) WHEN take_profit IS NOT NULL AND direction = 'SHORT' THEN ROUND(((entry_price - take_profit) / entry_price * 100)::numeric, 2) ELSE NULL END AS tp_distance_pct FROM trades WHERE status = 'open' ORDER BY opened_at DESC
